mukarram ahmad pawasa aththe da kuranaya dirimath karanne aathmarakshawa udesa satan kirima sadaha pamanak wana bawa ya. [41][42] ohu thawaduratath penwa di athi paridi sathuranta erehi wa satan kirimata awashya wana sama sudanam kirimak ma sadaha awashya magapenwima kuranaye dakwa thibena bawa yi. [43][44] ath thawba 5[sanskaranaya] asipath waki yanuwen hadunwa diya haki anyagamikayan samaga satan kirimata saha owun wa ghathanaya kirimata ana dena prabala waki dekak antoni wesals haduna gani.
